servinfo.title: Piston Pins and Connecting Rods Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Disassembly and Assembly:For M16A Engine with VVT

topic.title: Visual inspection
topic.ptxt: Check piston pin, connecting rod small end bore and piston bore for wear or damage, paying particular attention to condition of small end bore bush. If pin, connecting rod small end bore or piston bore is badly worn or damaged, replace pin, connecting rod and/or piston.

topic.title: Piston pin clearance
topic.ptxt: Check piston pin clearance in small end and piston. Replace connecting rod and/or piston if its small end is badly worn or damaged or if measured clearance exceeds limit.

spec.title: Piston pin clearance in connecting rod small end

topic.title: Big-end side clearance
topic.ptxt: Check big-end of connecting rod for side clearance, with rod fitted and connected to its crank pin in the normal manner. If measured clearance is found to exceed its limit, replace connecting rod.

topic.title: Connecting rod alignment
topic.ptxt: Mount connecting rod on aligner to check it for bow and twist. If measured value exceeds the limit, replace it.

topic.title: Connecting rod bolt deformation (Plastic deformation tightening bolt)
topic.ptxt: Measure each thread diameter of connecting rod bolt (2) at “A” on 32 mm (1.25 in.) from bolt mounting surface and “B” on 40 mm (1.57 in.) from bolt mounting surface by using a micrometer (3).
Calculate difference in diameters (“A” – “B”). If it is exceeds limit, replace connected rod (1).
